cgcloud__Visit_Job__c.name: cgcloud__Visit_Job__c
cgcloud__Visit_Job__c.description: This object contains answered questions and product surveys (jobs).

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Data_Type_Option__c.description: Reference to the answer of a pick list. internally required.

cgcloud__Display_Value__c.description: If the reference Job_Definition_Template is of type Toggle, description of the toggle value is shown else value is shown

cgcloud__Done__c.description: The answer has been entered: The job will be marked as Yes.

cgcloud__Job_Definition_Template_Descrip.description: Description text taken from job definition template.

cgcloud__Job_Definition_Template__c.description: Reference to the job definition template.

cgcloud__Job_Definition__c.description: Reference to the job definition of the respective activity.

cgcloud__Job_List__c.description: Reference to job list of a non-standard JDL

cgcloud__Job_Template_Description__c.description: Description text taken from job definition template.

cgcloud__Last_Value__c.description: Answered value taken from the last relevant call. The Value depends on the DataType that has been specified in the job definition template.

cgcloud__Manually__c.description: The answer (job) has been manually added by the user.

cgcloud__Number_of_Pictures__c.description: Count of number of pictures associated with the question.

cgcloud__Product__c.description: Reference to the product (in case of a product related survey).

cgcloud__Promotion__c.description: References to the name of the promotion.

cgcloud__Target_Value__c.description: Stored value taken from the relevant product assortment where the product was taken from.

cgcloud__Value__c.description: Answered value. The value depends on the DataType that has been specified in the job. definition template.
